name: Conciliation
description: Calm, soothe, or mollify a hostile spirit or beast.

name: Cultivation
description: Calm, soothe, or mollify a hostile spirit or beast.

name: Preservation
description: Convince others to protect something of natural beauty or of importance to Danu.

name: Renewal
description: Restore someone or thing to its prior, untainted state, or defeat a perversion of the natural order.

name: Conscience
description: Forego comfort or advantage to do the right thing.

name: Excitement
description: Cause an ally trouble by taking an unnecessary risk.

name: Glory
description: Show off in front of NPCs who will tell your tale.

name: Romance

name: Trickery
description: Get someone or thing to act on false information.
